name: Ramsey

topics.topic_text: 600 for all three? You've got a deal.
topics.response_text: Finally. Here's the key to the gate. Do whatever you want with 'em. I couldn't care less.

topics.topic_text: I need to think about it.
topics.response_text: What? Are you serious? You'd better hurry back here. I'd like to sell this meat some time before I'm an old man.

topics.topic_text: This is too much work. I'll just kill you.
topics.response_text: Oh, I knew not to trust you Pitt bastards!

topics.topic_text: Yeah, that's me. I'm here to buy these slaves.
topics.response_text: About damn time you showed up. We've been waiting here for-fucking-ever.{Midly annoyed and ansty.}

topics.topic_text: What are you doing out here?
topics.response_text: Waiting for Santa Claus, what do you think? We're here to do business.{Angry at having his time wasted.}
Not that it's any of your business, but we're waiting for some dudes who live up north.

topics.topic_text: I'll leave you to that, then.
I'm whoever you want me to be, baby.
topics.response_text: Well, that's how it is, huh? Well, right now I want you to be a customer.

topics.topic_text: Who, me? No. I'm just here to kill you slaving bastards.
topics.response_text: Oh? Is that so? Well then, kill away!{Mocking surprise.}

topics.topic_text: Oops. I'm in the wrong place. I'll just be going.
I want to buy your slaves.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Well, like I said: 200 each.

topics.topic_text: I just wanted to check on you.
topics.response_text: You're gonna be checking my foot up your ass if you don't leave us alone.
Hey! You're that asshole that shot up Paradise Falls! Oh, this is gonna be fun!

conversation.response_text: Hey! There's someone in the pen! Get 'em!

description:
Ramsey is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

Ramsey is a ruthless slaver operating from Paradise Falls, specializing in capturing unsuspecting wastelanders in the northern regions of the Capital Wasteland. He is known for his impatience and cruelty, often resorting to violence to achieve his goals. Ramsey and his group have been targeting travelers and settlers, selling their captives to raiders from The Pitt for profit. Currently, Ramsey is stationed at a train tunnel, awaiting the arrival of a contact from The Pitt to finalize a transaction.

Ramsey's Personality: Ramsey is cold, calculating, and utterly ruthless. He shows no remorse for his actions and views other people solely as commodities or obstacles. His impatience often leads to violent outbursts, and he has little tolerance for incompetence or delays. Despite his brutality, he is pragmatic and knows when to exercise caution, especially when dealing with dangerous factions like The Pitt.

Ramsey's Backstory: Ramsey grew up in the harsh environment of the Capital Wasteland, learning to survive by any means necessary. He eventually fell in with the slavers of Paradise Falls, finding a sense of belonging among like-minded individuals who shared his ruthless worldview. Over the years, Ramsey rose through the ranks, becoming one of the most effective slavers in the group. His reputation for brutality and efficiency earned him the trust of the Paradise Falls leadership. One of Ramsey's most notable captures was Wernher, a resourceful individual who managed to deactivate his slave collar and escape. This failure has haunted Ramsey, who now sees Wernher as a personal challenge. Determined to recapture him and restore his reputation, Ramsey has enlisted the help of raiders from The Pitt, offering them a share of the profits in exchange for their assistance in hunting down the escaped slave.
